assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Pekabex S.A. manufactures and sells prefabricated reinforced and pre-stressed concrete elements in Poland, Germany, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Switzerland, Hungary, Iceland, and internationally. It offers foundations, poles, floor beams, slabs, roof beams, walls, engineering prefabricated elements, and columns; auditorium slabs, toothed beams, and columns for stadiums; and other elements, including bridge abutments, tanks, stairs, prefabricated shells, and foundation basins. The company also executes special orders for individual designs; and provides consulting, designing, transportation, and assembly services. Its products and services serve industrial, commercial, office, cultural and sports facilities, halls, buildings, bridges, and large-size objects, as well as construction works related to the construction of residential and non-residential buildings, and civil engineering structures. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Poznan, Poland.
